title: Client Problems
body:
About 30 minutes ago I was able to use the client but now I am put in a loop of notifications and I am unable to access the client.

The series of notifications are the following:

1.  We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version.
2. Patching failed and we're not sure why. Please restart the client to try patching again. (Error code 004)
3. There was a problem patching League of Legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating again after you restart the patcher.
**RESTART**

Not sure why it keeps looping.

replies.body: Hmmm... this may be caused by the live service incident yesterday. Please let me know if you're still experiencing this.
